submit.title: Suggest Location
submit.subtitle: Share a sustainable location with the community
submit.howToAdd: How do you want to add a location?
submit.methodGoogleMaps: I have a Google Maps link
submit.methodGoogleMapsDesc: Best on desktop - copy URL from browser
submit.methodPinMap: I'll pin it on the map
submit.methodPinMapDescFull: Best if you're nearby or know the exact spot
submit.submissionType: What would you like to do?
submit.googleMapsUrlHelp: Coordinates and address will be auto-filled
submit.name: Name
submit.coordinatesHelp: Coordinates are automatically determined from the address
submit.emailHelp: We will send you a confirmation email for verification
submit.missingFields: Please fill in the following fields
submit.checkEmail: Please check your email and click the confirmation link.
submit.info: All submissions are reviewed by our team before appearing on the map.
submit.quickStartTitle: Let's start with a Google Maps link
submit.quickStartDescription: Paste a link and we'll fill in the details automatically
submit.nameQuestion: What's the name of this place?
submit.addDetailsDescription: Help others learn more about this place (optional)
submit.almostThereDescription: Enter your email to verify this submission
submit.couldNotFetchDetails: Couldn't fetch additional details. Please fill manually.
submit.noAdditionalDetails: No additional details found in OpenStreetMap
submit.replaceAutoFilled: This field was auto-filled. Clear it to enter manually.
submit.tutorialStep1: Find the location on Google Maps
submit.tutorialStep1Desc: Search or navigate to the place you want to add
submit.tutorialStep2: Copy the URL from your browser's address bar
submit.mobileHint: On mobile? Use 'Pin on Map' instead for better results.
submit.pasteLink: Paste your Google Maps link here
submit.tapToPlace: Tap on the map to place a pin
submit.dragToAdjust: Drag the pin to adjust the exact location
submit.foundNearby: Found {count} business nearby | Found {count} businesses nearby
submit.noPOIsFound: No businesses found at this location
submit.selectBusiness: Is this one of these locations?
submit.enterManually: None of these - I'll enter the name

verify.title: Verify Email
verify.successSubtitle: Your suggestion is on its way
verify.thankYouMessage: You just helped make the map a little bit better. Someone out there will discover this place thanks to you.
verify.reviewMessage: We'll take a look and add it to the map soon.
verify.communityTitle: You're now part of something bigger
verify.communityMessage: This map grows thanks to people like you. We're a small team with a big mission: making sustainable living easier for everyone. We're motivated and we're not going anywhere. Come back soon to discover new places and share your favorites with your friends!
verify.errorHelp: The verification link may have expired or already been used. Please try submitting again.

favorites.title: My Favorites
favorites.noFavoritesDescription: Save locations as favorites to see them here

login.title: Admin Login
login.magicLinkDescription: Enter your email to receive a login link
login.checkEmail: Check your email ({email}) for the login link
login.checkEmailGeneric: If this email is registered as an admin, you will receive a login link shortly.
login.rateLimited: Too many attempts. Please try again in 15 minutes.
login.genericError: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

dashboard.title: Admin Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Overview of location submissions and quick actions
dashboard.noPendingDescription: All submissions have been reviewed. Great job!

deleteConfirm.title: Delete Location
deleteConfirm.warning: This action cannot be undone. The location will be permanently removed from the map.

form.name: Name
form.slugAutoGenerated: Auto-generated from name, city, and suburb. Click edit to override manually.
form.slugManual: Manually edited. Click regenerate to restore auto-generation.
form.suburbHelp: e.g. Bockenheim, Sachsenhausen (important for SEO-friendly URLs)
form.clickMapToSet: Click on the map to set coordinates

iconSelector.label: Icon
iconSelector.error: Failed to search icons. Please try again.

categories.title: Categories

form.legacyIconWarning: This category uses an uploaded icon. Select an icon above to switch to the new dynamic marker system.

categories.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the category "{name}"?
categories.affectedLocations: {count} location(s) will be reassigned to another category
categories.reassignHelp: All locations in this category will be moved to the selected category
categories.confirmReassign: I understand this will reassign {count} location(s)
categories.noLocations: This category has no locations and can be safely deleted

errors.slugInvalid: Slug can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens
errors.cannotDeleteOtherDescription: The "Other" category is used as a default and cannot be deleted
errors.selectReassignCategory: Please select a category to reassign locations to

hoursSuggestions.title: Hours Suggestions
hoursSuggestions.subtitle: Review user-submitted opening hours corrections
hoursSuggestions.approveSuccess: Hours suggestion approved and location updated

notFound.title: Not Found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for doesn't exist. Would you like to return to the home page?
notFound.locationMessage: This location no longer exists or has been removed.

openingHours.disclaimer: Hours may be inaccurate. Please verify before visiting.

hoursSuggestion.title: Suggest opening hours
hoursSuggestion.notePlaceholder: e.g., I visited today and the hours were different...
hoursSuggestion.rateLimitError: Too many suggestions. Please try again later.
hoursSuggestion.successMessage: Thank you! Your suggestion will be reviewed.
hoursSuggestion.timeValidationError: Opening time must be before closing time

consent.title: Help us improve this map
consent.description: We use cookies to understand how the map is used - like which features are popular. We never track personal information or your location. Your data stays anonymous.

beta.tooltip: Click to learn more about the project
beta.title: Welcome, fellow zero waste adventurer
beta.subtitle: We haven't launched publicly yet, so you're getting a sneak peek. Things might break or behave strangely. Bear with us.
beta.whatIsThisText: A map to help you find sustainable shops, refill stations, and zero waste spots in Frankfurt. We're starting local but we have bigger plans.
beta.whyBuildingText: We want to make the zero waste journey less overwhelming. Finding the right places shouldn't be hard. And we believe that if people share what they know, everyone benefits.
beta.sideProject: This is a side project, built in the evenings after work. Progress happens when life allows, but we're committed to it.
beta.everyStep: Every small step matters. Even the tiny ones.
beta.feedbackTitle: Found something broken? Have an idea?
beta.feedbackSubtitle: We actually want to hear about it.
beta.feedbackPlaceholder: Tell us what's on your mind...
beta.successMessage: Your feedback has been sent. We appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts.
beta.rateLimitMessage: You've sent feedback recently. Please wait {seconds}s before sending another message.
beta.messageRequired: Message must be at least 10 characters long
beta.feedbackToggle: Sometimes it's OK to say something nice too! ;)
